title: HIGH FPS, LOW PING, NO PACKAGE LOSS, STILL LAG?
body:
hello,
i have high fps, low ping and no package loss but still lag? i can only play with an ethernet now which is a hassle as the wifi modem ist in my room. what do i do to fix this ?

Thanks

replies.body: If a high FPS is the only problem you're seeing currently, it most likely doesn't have anything to do with your connection at all since you graphics are being processed by the graphics card and drivers and not your network. My first thought is that you might have missed some driver updates possibly, so be sure to check for that as well as the other steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting).
